title: x/mobile/example/audio: Android build is broken
body:
Due to https://github.com/golang/mobile/commit/5cddc1460eb901a432e0f1c49bf4676bae8c5e7b, audio example and audio package is not compiling for Android.

```
gomobile build golang.org/x/example/audio
# golang.org/x/mobile/audio/al
../../audio/al/al_android.go:249: invalid type assertion: app.GetConfig().(<inter>) (non-interface type app.Config on left)
exit status 2
gomobile: exit status 2
```
